trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger vad som skall vidtas vid återgivning tal sammanfattande Markup Language (SSML) en given <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: TtsEngineAction represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction representerar begäranden för att underhålla <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Åtgärderna som motsvarar tillsammans element i SSML-specifikationen och implementeras på texten som returneras av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TtsEngineAction value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction-värde som associeras med en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>returneras av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Processing of the TtsEngineAction value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Bearbetning av TtsEngineAction-värdet som returneras av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen hanteras av ett tal Syntetiserar implementeringar av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metoden för en klass som härleds från <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Anger att <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> ska användas som innehållet i ett bokmärke.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Motsvarar den `<mark>` XML-tagg i SSML-specifikationen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Anger att ingen åtgärd har fastställts från SSML-indata.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: Den associerade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>är en okänd XML-tagg inte en del av SSML-standard.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Den här indata som kan tolkas eller ignoreras av en sammanfattande motor gottfinnande.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Begäranden som indata <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> text tolkas som fonemen.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Exakt uttal anges av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>medlem i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektet som returneras av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instanser.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Motsvarar den `<Phoneme>` XML-tagg i SSML-specifikationen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Anger att en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> inte innehåller någon text som ska renderas som tal.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Varaktighet för tystnaden anges av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>tillhör he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektet som returnerades av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instanser.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Motsvarar den `<Silence>` XML-tagg i SSML-specifikationen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Begär att den associerade <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> ska bearbetas och talas.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of TtsEngineAction for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Detta är standardvärdet för TtsEngineAction för en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, motsvarar den `<speak>` XML-tagg i SSML-specifikationen</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> through its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Anger att textvärden som tillhandahålls av en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> via dess <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>egenskapen är att syntetisera som enskilda tecken.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: Den här återgivning innehåller skiljetecken än blanksteg, samt alfanumeriskt.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: Till exempel associerade dig textfragment "word!"

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: ska vara synthsized i "w o r d utropstecken".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Visar status för punkt.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Motsvarar den `

` XML-tagg i SSML-specifikationen

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Anger början av meningen.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Motsvarar den `<s>` XML-tagg i SSML-specifikationen

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
